citations.narrative:
Pest control. There were mouse droppings on shelves in the animal room and along the wall by the garage door.
Cardboard boxes with storage items are place on the floor below the shelves. Licensee must established and maintained
and effective pest control program to prevent potential health risks to the guinea pigs. Preventing hiding and living areas
for mice by removing cardboard boxes, not storing items on the floor along the wall, and cleaning shelves can help to
control pest problems. Correct by January 27, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member.
End Section

narrative:
3.31(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
Pest control. There were mouse droppings on shelves in the animal room and along the wall by the garage door. 
Cardboard boxes with storage items are place on the floor below the shelves. Licensee must  established and maintained 
and effective pest control program to prevent potential health risks to the guinea pigs. Preventing hiding and living areas 
for mice by removing cardboard boxes, not storing items on the floor along the wall, and cleaning shelves can help to 
control pest problems. Correct by January 27, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member. 
 
End Section
